name: Mandaloun
description: Mandaloun started well and was fourth. He slowly moved up and challenged the leader, Medina Spirit, who won by +1‚ÅÑ2 length. After the Kentucky Derby, an investigation was launched because of doping issues with Medina Spirit, who died on December 6, 2021. There was also an investigation of his trainer, Bob Baffert. On February 21, 2022, upon the disqualification of Medina Spirit, Mandaloun was awarded first place in the 2021 Kentucky Derby
